value.title: StarCraft 2: Most EPIC GAME played on the new Patch! (Dark vs ByuN)
value.excerpt: An amazing game of StarCraft 2 between Dark (Zerg) and ByuN (Terran). In this match of SC2 we watch two pro gamers perform at the absolute peak of their abilities... with of course a few mistakes here and there. value.title: Harstem ABUSES most OP unit against my Protoss team | Commander Mode #3 - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: What is Commander Mode? It is Archon Mode vs another streamer/player where we are the Commanders of our squadron of noobs but we can't actively control anything ourselves, we can only command them what to do!   This time we go up against an actual Captain, HARSTEM! Here's his viewpoint: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wIjJ2uA6_ig&ab_channel=Harstem
